title: Question-Based Learning Strategies for Improving Science Learning Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific disciplines and grasp of foundational learning theories
context.additional_context: A program where practicing professionals explore science content across diverse contexts (pure science/science history), generating questions and strengthening problem-solving competencies

learning_goals: Learners will generate at least three differentiated questions by analyzing scientific content within both pure science and history of science contexts.
Learners will reconstruct existing schemas of scientific concepts through question-based learning and derive at least two new relational connections.
Learners will achieve 80% or higher recall ability in delayed assessments 30 days after learning scientific concepts.

resources: Science Content Module (Pure Science/History of Science Version)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
